statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPCloudRunAuthorizedDomain)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Cloudrun Authorized Domains that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.
